definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: The first flame torcher Liu Xiang ran over Tian'an men Square during domestic torch relay for Beijing Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 北京奥运会境内第一棒火炬手刘翔跑过天安门广场。

sentences.english: Tian An Men Square looks even more beautiful with all lights on.
sentences.chinese: 所有的灯都亮着，天安门广场显得更加漂亮。

sentences.english: The Museum of Chinese Revolution is on the right of Tiananmen Squre.
sentences.chinese: 中国革命历史博物馆就在天安门广场的右侧。

sentences.english: Prominent anti-American slogans in Tienanmen Square have still not been taken down.
sentences.chinese: 天安门广场上显眼的反美标语仍没有被撤下。

sentences.english: For just a few minutes he sat on a rostrum overlooking Tien An Men Square to watch a fireworks display.
sentences.chinese: 在观礼台上坐了几分钟观看天安门广场的烟火表演。

sentences.english: Tian An Men Square is flanked by the Great Hall of the People and the Museum of the Chinese Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 天安门广场两侧是人民大会堂和中国革命博物馆。

sentences.english: Where's the famous Quanjude Peking duck restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 全聚德烤鸭店就在天安门广场南面。

sentences.english: The national flag flies high in Tian An Men Square.
sentences.chinese: 国旗在天安门广场高高飘扬。

sentences.english: He is staying at Beijing Hotel near Tien AN Men Square.
sentences.chinese: 他住在天安门广场附近的北京饭店。

sentences.english: A flag at half-mast was also seen at Xinhuamen.
sentences.chinese: 数千人在天安门广场观看了升旗和降半旗仪式。

definition: Tiananmen Gate, entrance of the Imperial City in Beijing
Monument to the People's Heroes, at Tiananmen Square
pinyin: Ren2 min2 Ying1 xiong2 Ji4 nian4 bei1

definition: to raise a flag/to hoist a flag
the Great Hall of the People in Beijing
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Shichahai, scenic area of northwest Beijing with three lakes
a street to the south of the Forbidden City that was the Legation quarter during the Boxer uprising
